publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5268 Dr Richard Simpson: Scotland Rugby Victory—That the Parliament congratulates Andy Robinson, all 22 players and the other coaches for the victory over Australia, achieved by one of the best defensive efforts ever seen by a Scottish team, and wishes the team every success in the forthcoming match against Argentina.
S3M-5268 Scotland Rugby Victory (lodged on 24 November 2009) Jack McConnell*

S3M-5268 Dr Richard Simpson: Scotland Rugby Victory—That the Parliament congratulates Andy Robinson, all 22 players and the other coaches for the victory over Australia, achieved by one of the best defensive efforts ever seen by a Scottish team, and wishes the team every success in the forthcoming match against Argentina. Supported by: Jack McConnell
S3M-5268 Scotland Rugby Victory (lodged on 24 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-5268 Scotland Rugby Victory (lodged on 24 November 2009) Rhoda Grant*
